attributes.title: CANCEL DOUALD TRUMP 🤢🤢🤢

I have never been more disappointed in America. For having elected the most insanely idiotic, imbecilic, disrespectful, insensitive, RACIST, and ignorant man to ever walk the face of the Earth to be our president. That’s all I had to say 🥰

attributes.title: Very glitchy and has HORRIBLE content
attributes.review: I’m fully convinced this app is from hell. It tried to steal ALL my information lucky I was able to stop it

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Never had an app more awful than this one. Do NOT download, terrible navigation, just all-around awful.

attributes.title: ✨ Trash ✨
attributes.review: This app is terrifying. The first thing I saw when I opened it was a large orange Oompa Loompa. If this app stays it should be categorized in horror apps. Please remove this app. Like I’ve stated before. It’s terrifying. Thank you.

attributes.title: I’m so tired.
attributes.review: This is a horrible app. Ever since I got it my phone has been crying itself to sleep and I am getting zero sleep as a result. How do I make it stop?

attributes.title: You want to get rid of TikTok, then gen z will find a way to get rid of your app.
attributes.review: I don’t know why you would want to do something that horrible.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: What an eyesore. Can’t believe I ever downloaded this terrible app. Just wanted to support our president and it’s horrible. Buttons are too small for my gargantuan thumbs.

attributes.title: A waste of time
attributes.review: After seeing that it took a week to download it, it became tiresome by how inaccurate this app truly is and it’s being funded by our Cheeto

attributes.title: nOt good
attributes.review: ✨🧚‍♂️ would have liked this app💫💕 but it seemed to crash every time i opened it 🧚‍♀️💜 hope it doesn’t get fixed :)
